hooks.command: echo "[GIT STATUS] $(git status --short 2>/dev/null || echo 'not a git repo')"

command -v jq >/dev/null 2>&1 || { echo 'BLOCKED: jq required for safety hooks. Install jq.' >&2; exit 2; }; jq -r '.tool_input.command // empty' | { IFS= read -r -d '' cmd || true; cmd_lower=$(printf '%s' "$cmd" | tr '[:upper:]' '[:lower:]' | tr '\n' ' '); case "$cmd_lower" in *'rm -rf'*'/'*|*'rm -r '*'/'*|*'rm --recursive'*'/'*|*'rm -rf ~'*|*'rm -r ~'*|*'drop database'*|*'drop schema'*|*'drop table'*|*'truncate '*|*'> /dev/'*|*'mkfs'*|*'dd if'*) echo 'BLOCKED: Destructive command detected' >&2; exit 2;; *) exit 0;; esac; }

command -v jq >/dev/null 2>&1 || { echo 'BLOCKED: jq required for safety hooks. Install jq.' >&2; exit 2; }; jq -r '.tool_input.command // empty' | { IFS= read -r -d '' cmd || true; cmd_lower=$(printf '%s' "$cmd" | tr '[:upper:]' '[:lower:]' | tr '\n' ' '); case "$cmd_lower" in *'git push'*origin*main*|*'git push'*origin*master*|*'git push'*'--force'*|*'git push'*'-f '*) echo 'BLOCKED: Direct push to main/master or force push. Use feature branches.' >&2; exit 2;; *) exit 0;; esac; }
command -v jq >/dev/null 2>&1 || exit 0; jq -r '.tool_input.file_path // empty' | { read f; [ -n "$f" ] && echo "$(date +%H:%M:%S) WRITE: $f" >> .golem/logs/file-changes.log 2>/dev/null; exit 0; }
if [ -f .golem/state.json ]; then echo "$(date +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S) Session ended" >> .golem/logs/session.log 2>/dev/null; fi; exit 0
